title:
One-sided $S$-systems of operations and character-free proof of
  Frobenius theorem
abstract:
In this work, the author gives a character-free proof of the Frobenius
theorem. The new proof is based on some notions and results from the theory of
ternary operations, the theory of orthogonal binary operations, the theory of
transversals in groups and the theory of quasigroups and loops.
